mapper.insert: INSERT INTO episode (work_no, episode_name, episode_order, e_thumbnail, episode_date, file_name, directory) VALUES (#{workNo : INTEGER}, #{episodeName : VARCHAR}, #{episodeOrder : INTEGER}, #{eThumbnail : VARCHAR}, now(), #{fileName : VARCHAR}, #{directory : VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE episode SET work_no = #{workNo : INTEGER}, episode_name = #{episodeName : VARCHAR}, episode_order = #{episodeOrder : INTEGER}, e_thumbnail = #{eThumbnail : VARCHAR}, episode_date = now(), file_name = #{fileName : VARCHAR}, directory = #{directory : VARCHAR} WHERE episode_no = #{episodeNo : INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM episode WHERE work_no = #{workNo : INTEGER} ORDER BY episode_order
